title: AI Image Social Media
description: A web app that allows users to create AI images and share them with the community (includes full registration/sign-in functionality).

title: Malaria Diagnosis
description: Developed a deep learning model leveraging convolutional neural networks (CNNs) for the diagnosis of malaria from blood cell images.

title: Stock Market Prediction
description: Created machine learning classification models based on SPY index fund data to predict directionality of the stock price.
